power.title: Demoralizing Strike
power.fluff: The fury of your assault causes a surge of fear in your foe's heart

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to Will until the start of your next turn.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses until the start of your next turn.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target takes a penalty to all defenses until the start of your next turn. The penalty equals 1 + one-half your Constitution modifier (minimum -2 penalty).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target takes one-half the penalty to Will until the start of your next turn.

power.title: Energizing Strike
power.fluff: The energy and emotion you put into your attack flows into your ally

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: One ally within 5 squares of you gains temporary hit points. The temporary hit points equal your Charisma modifier, or one-half this amount if your attack missed.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 3 + your Charisma modifier temporary hit points.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 6 + your Charisma modifier temporary hit points.
The power gains the Healing keyword

section.name: Effect:
section.text: One dying ally within 5 squares of you regains hit points. The hit points regained equal your Charisma modifier, or one-half this amount if your attack was a miss.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 4 + your Charisma modifier hit points regained.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 8 + your Charisma modifier hit points regained.
The power gains the Healing keyword

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: One ally within 5 squares of you can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

power.title: Focusing Strike
power.fluff: You attack your foe with calm and clarity of mind, extending that clarity to give a nearby ally a chance to clear a lingering effect

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You or one ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You or one ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end. If the effect has the Charm or Fear keyword, the saving throw gains a power bonus equal to your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You and each ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end. If the effect has the Charm or Fear keyword, the saving throw gains a power bonus equal to your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Impetuos Ruin
power.fluff: Your strike hobbles your enemy's impulsiveness, preventing it from reacting in the heat of combat

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] damage, and the target cannot make opportunity attacks against creatures other than you until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] damage, and the target cannot take opportunity actions or immediate actions until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
